title: How much data does Netflix consume in an hour? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is a screenshot of how much data Netflix claims to consume:  To change these settings, click here: Netflix The settings need to be changed per user profile and it will be the same across any device you use to stream Netflix.
It depends on the resolution of the program. SD (480P) will use around 700MB an hourHD (1080P) will use around 1.5GB an hourUHD (3160P) will use around 7.2GB an hour
